info.task: navigate backwards to pressed toggle button
info.title: Navigate backwards to a pressed toggle button in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterButtonAndSetStateToPressed
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the button, and sets the state of the button to 'pressed'

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Mute' button.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Mute' button.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.
